contract.description: Semantic version of the theme contract this theme targets (e.g. 1.0.0).

targets.description: Which high-level artifacts this theme overrides.

priority.description: Higher wins when layering multiple themes.

tokens.description: Optional design tokens (colors, radius, typography, etc.).

templates.description: Template overrides keyed by artifact id (e.g. weekly.dashboard). Values are Markdown or string templates.

assets.description: Static assets keyed by id (svg/png/css). Values are inlined content or relative paths resolved by the theme package.
